name: MIS Incidents for an Establishment by Incident Type For a Date Range
description:
Incidents that have occurred at establishments for a date range and Incident type selected at Runtime. Includes Incident Text.
INC0028 v00.00.02 Last Modified: 21/11/2019

dataset.name: Prisoner related
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TITLE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, 12, 2)) AS INCIDENT_HOUR, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (((AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-11-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('21-11-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND ((INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC)) IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, INCIDENT_TYPE, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, DAY_DATE, INCIDENT_TEXT, INCIDENT_TITLE, INCIDENT_TIME, INCIDENT_HOUR, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, SUBSTR(INCIDENT_TEXT, 1, 1000) AS V_INCIDENT_TEXT_LEFT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Incidents
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TITLE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, 12, 2)) AS INCIDENT_HOUR, '-' AS DUMMY_CELL, '-' AS DUMMY_UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4, '' AS OFFENCES_DUMMY_MAIN_OFFENCE, '' AS INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_MAIN_OF52, '' AS PROPERTY_BOX_TYPE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (((AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-11-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('21-11-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND ((INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC)) IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT INCIDENT_TYPE, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, DAY_DATE, INCIDENT_TEXT, INCIDENT_TITLE, INCIDENT_TIME, INCIDENT_HOUR, DUMMY_CELL, DUMMY_UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4, OFFENCES_DUMMY_MAIN_OFFENCE, INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_MAIN_OF52, PROPERTY_BOX_TYPE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: INCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_MAIN_OF52
field.display: Incident Participant Main Offence.Dummy Main Offence

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_EXCLUDE_ NOT(IN ('Exclude')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_EXCLUDE_ NOT(IN ('Exclude')))
